page.title: 19ALAN TITE _ CHIMNEY SWEEP
page.content: My father is a chimney sweep.He has been doing this job for about 4-5 years.He took over the job from my Grandad.He works around this area and often goes to Henham and Bishop's Stortford.It usually takes him about an hour to sweep a chimney.If he does a big house, with maybe 6 chimneys,it takes him about three hours.He uses a vacuum cleaner and he has to use at least 10 rods.He collects at least Â£20 a day depending on the amount of chimneys he sweeps.If he does four chimneys he will get about Â£24.He charges Â£6 for normal people and Â£4 for old age pensioners.He usually puts the rate up every year by Â£1. He might have to clean out his vacuum cleaner depending on the amount of dust he has collected.
